parameters.name: options `Object`
parameters.description: An object which may contain the following keys:* `logic` -  *string* - either `"and"` or `"or"`.* `criteria` - an *array* of objects, containing `operator` (String) and `value` (String|Date|Number) fields.The supported criteria operators are: `eq` (equal to), `neq` (not equal to), `lt` (less than), `lte` (less than or equal to), `gt` (greater than), `gte` (greater than or equal to).In addition, `startswith`, `endswith`, `contains`, `doesnotstartwith` and `doesnotendwith` are supported for cells that contain strings.
